00018 #ifndef BT_PATH_SOLVER_H
00019 #define BT_PATH_SOLVER_H

00024 extern "C" {
00025 #include "PATH/SimpleLCP.h"
00026 #include "PATH/License.h"
00027 #include "PATH/Error_Interface.h"
00028 };
00029   void __stdcall MyError(Void *data, Char *msg)
00030 {
00031         printf("Path Error: %s\n",msg);
00032 }
00033   void __stdcall MyWarning(Void *data, Char *msg)
00034 {
00035         printf("Path Warning: %s\n",msg);
00036 }
00037 
00038 Error_Interface e;
00039 
00040 
00041 
00042 #include "btMLCPSolverInterface.h"
00043 #include "Dantzig/lcp.h"
00044 
00045 class btPathSolver : public btMLCPSolverInterface
00046 {
00047 public:
00048 
00049         btPathSolver()
00050         {
00051                 License_SetString("2069810742&Courtesy_License&&&USR&2013&14_12_2011&1000&PATH&GEN&31_12_2013&0_0_0&0&0_0");
00052                 e.error_data = 0;
00053                 e.warning = MyWarning;
00054                 e.error = MyError;
00055                 Error_SetInterface(&e);
00056         }
00057 
00058 
00059         virtual bool solveMLCP(const btMatrixXu & A, const btVectorXu & b, btVectorXu& x, const btVectorXu & lo,const btVectorXu & hi,const btAlignedObjectArray<int>& limitDependency, int numIterations, bool useSparsity = true)
00060         {
00061                 MCP_Termination status;
00062                 
00063 
00064                 int numVariables = b.rows();
00065                 if (0==numVariables)
00066                         return true;
00067 
00068                         /*       - variables - the number of variables in the problem
00069                         - m_nnz - the number of nonzeros in the M matrix
00070                         - m_i - a vector of size m_nnz containing the row indices for M
00071                         - m_j - a vector of size m_nnz containing the column indices for M
00072                         - m_ij - a vector of size m_nnz containing the data for M
00073                         - q - a vector of size variables
00074                         - lb - a vector of size variables containing the lower bounds on x
00075                         - ub - a vector of size variables containing the upper bounds on x
00076                         */
00077                 btAlignedObjectArray<double> values;
00078                 btAlignedObjectArray<int> rowIndices;
00079                 btAlignedObjectArray<int> colIndices;
00080 
00081                 for (int i=0;i<A.rows();i++)
00082                 {
00083                         for (int j=0;j<A.cols();j++)
00084                         {
00085                                 if (A(i,j)!=0.f)
00086                                 {
00087                                         //add 1, because Path starts at 1, instead of 0
00088                                         rowIndices.push_back(i+1);
00089                                         colIndices.push_back(j+1);
00090                                         values.push_back(A(i,j));
00091                                 }
00092                         }
00093                 }
00094                 int numNonZero = rowIndices.size();
00095                 btAlignedObjectArray<double> zResult;
00096                 zResult.resize(numVariables);
00097                 btAlignedObjectArray<double> rhs;
00098                 btAlignedObjectArray<double> upperBounds;
00099                 btAlignedObjectArray<double> lowerBounds;
00100                 for (int i=0;i<numVariables;i++)
00101                 {
00102                         upperBounds.push_back(hi[i]);
00103                         lowerBounds.push_back(lo[i]);
00104                         rhs.push_back(-b[i]);
00105                 }
00106 
00107 
00108                 SimpleLCP(numVariables,numNonZero,&rowIndices[0],&colIndices[0],&values[0],&rhs[0],&lowerBounds[0],&upperBounds[0], &status, &zResult[0]);
00109 
00110                 if (status != MCP_Solved)
00111                 {
00112                         static const char* gReturnMsgs[] = {
00113                                 "Invalid return",
00114                                 "MCP_Solved: The problem was solved",
00115                                 "MCP_NoProgress: A stationary point was found",
00116                                 "MCP_MajorIterationLimit: Major iteration limit met",
00117                                 "MCP_MinorIterationLimit: Cumulative minor iteration limit met",
00118                                 "MCP_TimeLimit: Ran out of time",
00119                                 "MCP_UserInterrupt: Control-C, typically",
00120                                 "MCP_BoundError: Problem has a bound error",
00121                                 "MCP_DomainError: Could not find starting point",
00122                                 "MCP_Infeasible: Problem has no solution",
00123                                 "MCP_Error: An error occurred within the code",
00124                                 "MCP_LicenseError: License could not be found",
00125                                 "MCP_OK"
00126                         };
00127 
00128                         printf("ERROR: The PATH MCP solver failed: %s\n", gReturnMsgs[(unsigned int)status]);// << std::endl;
00129                         printf("using Projected Gauss Seidel fallback\n");
00130                         
00131                         return false;
00132                 } else
00133                 {
00134                         for (int i=0;i<numVariables;i++)
00135                         {
00136                                 x[i] = zResult[i];
00137                                 //check for #NAN
00138                                 if (x[i] != zResult[i])
00139                                         return false;
00140                         }
00141                         return true;
00142 
00143                 }
00144 
00145         }
00146 };
00147 
00148 #endif //BT_USE_PATH
